RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 69. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GT GOT A TARZAN broke out, bumped, dueled, best. EBW MACGYVER vied, outfinished. FIONA SEIS crowded start. HEZ OUR FIRST CALL broke in. QUEEN OF DRAMA steady bid. AJS CARTEL bumped both sides start. LISTEN LINDA B bumped, pushed out start. CANCUN came in start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MFS CHEERIO bumped start, in tight early, drew clear. FABULOUS GREEN EAGLE veered in start, vied, no match late. TIMELESS TEMPTATION broke in, bumped. BESTPRINCESSRETURNS broke in. CORAZON STOLI bumped start. RIBBON TRAIN broke in, bumped, in tight early. TAKEALOOKATMYDASH came in start. VA EAGLE DASHING no threat. QUEEEN OF THE CARTEL outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Green Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, vied, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Ribbon Train
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped, in tight early

ENTRY.NAME: Mfs Cheerio
ENTRY.OWNER: RH Bros LLC and Cavazos Jr Anastacio
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, in tight early, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Takealookatmydash
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Martin Scott Chris and Carroll David

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GABRIEL under pressure, held. DAWSON LEGATE broke in, dueled, outfinished. MALAMUTE SALOON close throughout, game. FAVORITE WAVE close throughout. BEDAZZLED SKY bumped start. DESTINYCHILD mid pack, evenly. TIA PERLA bumped start. TIPPIN BAC A CORONA broke in. SHEZ FLYING EC no threat. EBW SOPHIA broke slowly, lost path.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 80. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLYING SOPHIA drew off, best. AMMUNITION pushed in, bumped. ACE HYGH broke in. KINDA TEMTED Z bobbled, broke in. EL CASTILE pushed in, brushed. EAGLES DIVA hopped, bobbled start. EMMYLEW veered out start. THE DIRTY SOUTH bobbled, bumped. EL MONO PLAY BOY brushed start. RELENTLESSDREAMER veered in, in tight rail.

ENTRY.NAME: Relentlessdreamer
ENTRY.OWNER: Cate Jerry Lejeune Brennan and Goodfellow Kirk M

ENTRY.NAME: The Dirty South
ENTRY.OWNER: Durbin Kenneth and Durbin Carrol A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 350 Y Dirt CR: 82. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNING TO THE MOON broke out, drifted, dueled, best. ACAPULCO BAY vied, outfinished. FULL MOONE broke in, bumped. TYKOONE veered out. FANCY POLLITICS no mishap. JETTING THRU CLOUDS came in, bumped. MISS LETHAL HERO bumped, squeezed, pinched back. ONE SOUTHERN HERO stumbled badly, bumped. SOUTHWEST PRIZE veered out.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 80. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAVORITE NOVA drew clear, drinving. A FABULOUS MIRACLE broke in, chased. JOEYS POLICY clean trip. HOPE HES SPECIAL veered out start. HOCKALISHOUS clear path. FAMOUS PRIME TIME veered out start. WOLF MOUNTAIN broke slowly, bumped, squeezed. FUU MAN CHU bobbled, bumped, pushed out. ARROW broke in air, crowded. Following a stewards' inquiry, HOPE HES SPECIAL was disqualified and placed eighth for causing interference at the start.

ENTRY.NAME: Arrow
ENTRY.OWNER: White Gene E and Schindler Gene

ENTRY.NAME: Wolf Mountain
ENTRY.OWNER: Lee Truman Lee Vaughn Denny Steve and Evans Jr Jack W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 78. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WYNNCHESTER dueled, proved best. PAINT THIS ROSE came out start, vied, outfinished. BABY BOGART steady bid. SHALAM clean trip. SC JESSIE D no mishap. PHOOB in close, faded. LIL LADYS GOT GAME veered out start. ONE CORONA HERO broke in, crowded, bore in. GS BREAKAWAY stumbled start, bore out, steadied.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Ruidoso Downs Juvenile Challenge Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 350 Y Dirt CR: 83. Futurity Trial Purse 6000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO 2023 JOHN DEERE RUIDOSO DOWNS QUARTER HORSE JUVENILE. Weight: 124 lbs. All Horses Must Enter For Trials on Friday August 21, 2023. Ten Fastest Qualifiers From The Trials Will Qualify For The Final. There Will Be No Also Eligible List For The Final.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE LITTLE LIAR broke in, drew clear. TELL JONES drifted, chased. APOLLITICAL SUZE bumped start, drifted out. TWISTERR mid pack, evenly. EXODUS1 evenly, no mishap. POLITICAL MOTIONS broke in. APOLLITICAL CRUZ broke in. SWAY WHAAT bumped start, crowded stretch. FULL BOOGIE drifted in, crowded, steadied. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning possible interference in the stretch. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Apollitical Suze
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Larry L and Rice Bobbie

ENTRY.NAME: Sway Whaat
ENTRY.OWNER: Burns Steve D Draper Robyne Willis Ray Criswell David and O'Dell Colten G

ENTRY.NAME: Full Boogie

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WISKEY CROWN vied two across, was carried out leaving the turn, fell back, continued willingly to the wire and inched clear late. LEAD MONTEREY vied inside, swung out leaving the turn, continued to duel through the stretch and was outfinished in a good effort. SOLID GOLD BAR pressed the pace, got through along the rail on the turn, dueled for the lead, hung late and settled for show. JAZZ MAN DO raced six wide along the backstretch, pressed the pace, challenged four across into the turn, swung wide, fell back and finished evenly. ALMOST A STORM raced outside, bid three wide between horses into the turn to challenge, fell back, swung wide and gave way. QUIEN ES raced far back and passed a tiring rival. GOLD BOUNDRY was steadied leaving the gate, dropped inside, was steadied entering the turn, angled out, swung wide and dropped further back.

ENTRY.NAME: Quien Es
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back, trailed, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Monterey
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, swung out leaving turn, outfinished, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Wiskey Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, carried out leaving turn, steady bid, clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Boundry
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, dropped inside, steadied into turn swung wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Solid Gold Bar
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, got through rail turn, dueled, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Almost a Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, bid 3w between horses into turn, fell back,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz Man Do
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, challenged 4across into turn, swung wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 13200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAN MANNA pressed the pace four across, challenged for the lead entering the stretch, dueled to late stretch and drew clear. ALLERGIC TO LOGIC vied inside, fell back on the turn, came again to contend, hung late and finished second best. SHAKE RAG set a pressured pace while racing between horses, was unable to sustain her bid and was all out for show. TIZ FOR REAL raced close to the pace, angled out for the drive, closed well and didn't have enough late. MIDNIGHT SPECIAL T was void of early speed, swung wide leaving the turn and finished well. LITTLE SAMURAI was never far back, lacked a stretch response and was not a threat. ROBTHEQUEEN raced close to the pace along the inside, was steadied into the turn, dropped back and gave way. BINALLOVERDRINKEN broke slowly, was taken outside, vied three across and stopped on the turn. FI FI D'ORO was pulled up and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Binalloverdrinken
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, taken outside, vied 3across, stopped turn

ENTRY.NAME: Robthequeen
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, steadied into turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Allergic to Logic
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, fell back turn, came again, hung late, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz for Real
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, angled out for drive, closed well, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Special T
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, swung wide leaving turn, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Shake Rag
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses, set pressured pace, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Samurai
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, lacked a stretch response, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Manna
ENTRY.OWNER: Centurion Racing Partners LLC and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4across, challenged into stretch, dueled, clear late
